metadata.title: CVE-2015-3231 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The Render cache system in Drupal 7.x before 7.38, when used to cachecontent by user role, allows remote authenticated users to obtain privatecontent viewed by user 1 by reading the cache.

criterions.comment: drupal7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
